SEARCH
Package Main

Class HotelReservationSystem

java.lang.Object
Controller.HRSController
public class HotelReservationSystem extends Object
The HotelReservationSystem class manages the operations related to hotel reservations. This allows creating hotels, viewing hotel details, managing hotel properties, and simulating bookings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HotelReservationSystem()
    Constructs a new Controller.HRSController with an empty list of hotels.

      numOfRooms - the number of rooms in the new hotel

    • manageHotel

      public void manageHotel(String hotelName)
      Manages the properties of a specific hotel, allowing changes to its details, rooms, and reservations.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel to manage

    • simulateBooking

      public void simulateBooking(String hotelName, String guestName, int checkInDate, int checkOutDate)
      Simulates the booking of a room in a specified hotel for a guest within a date range.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - the name of the hotel
      guestName - the name of the guest
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date

      Returns:
